judges: Before Frazer, C. J., Kephart, Schaffer, Maxey, Drew, Linn and Barnes, JJ.

opinions.text:
Per Curiam,
Tbe decree is affirmed on tbe opinion of Judge Mitchell for tbe court in banc.
opinions.author: Per Curiam,

casebody.head_matter:

Argued October 10, 1935.
Before Frazer, C. J., Kephart, Schaffer, Maxey, Drew, Linn and Barnes, JJ.

November 25, 1935:
